conbody.p: (c) Requests for waivers to the policy at DFARS 222.7402 must be submitted to the Secretary of Defense through Contract Policy and International Contracting of Defense Procurement and Acquisition Policy, OUSD(AT&L) DPAP/CPIC at 3060 Defense Pentagon, Room 5E621, Washington, D.C. 20301-3060. Requests for waivers may be submitted electronically to the following CPIC email address: osd.pentagon.ousd-atl.mbx.cpic@mail.mil. Include “Waiver-Mandatory Arbitration” in the subject line of the message.
